byline.contributor: Bryant Rousseau and Caryn Wilson contributed reporting.

abstract: Experts assess track record of United Nations over last decade on handling refugees, war and peace, human rights, terrorism, gender equality and climate change.

headline.print_headline: A Look at the U.N. Record on Urgent Global Issues
headline.main: Examining the U.N.’s Record on Urgent Global Challenges
